channel.title: Ipban commands
channel.description: can any1 make me or give me an ipban command? in code box please.

item.title: Ipban commands
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

let me get for ya =P[br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2007, 08:33:11 PM[/size][hr]heres simply a ban one… if you can use it at all do so if not wait a lil longer till I find the ip ban one cuz i’m still looking…

[code] if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(" Enter Your Characters Name Here")))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic
